hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) Intraday Washout Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: In a BULL or NEUTRAL regime, if a meme coin (DOGE or PEPE) experiences a sharp intraday drop of -15% or more within a 2-hour period on elevated volume (>150% of 20-hour average), a long position will capture a swift partial rebound of at least +5% before a -3% stop-loss is triggered.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins are driven by retail sentiment and often exhibit 'panic sell' cascades followed by rapid, albeit partial, rebounds as weak hands are cleared out. The elevated volume confirms capitulation. This works best when the broader market tone (Bull/Neutral) is not driving sustained selling.
entry_conditions: Volume in the worst 2-hour period > 150% of 20-hour average volume
Entry 15 minutes after the low of the washout candle is established
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The +5% rebound target is achieved in less than 50% of signals before the stop-loss, indicating the selloff is more likely to be structural than a washout.
